mapper.select: select * from application where login_name=#{loginName} and login_pass=#{loginPass} and is_delete=0

mapper.update:
update application
vip_takeout_discount = #{vipTakeoutDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vip_run_discount = #{vipRunDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
useable_money = #{useableMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_pass = #{loginPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vip_takeout_discount_flag = #{vipTakeoutDiscountFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_run_discount_flag = #{vipRunDiscountFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_school_count = #{maxSchoolCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update application set vip_takeout_discount = #{vipTakeoutDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vip_run_discount = #{vipRunDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, useable_money = #{useableMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_pass = #{loginPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vip_takeout_discount_flag = #{vipTakeoutDiscountFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vip_run_discount_flag = #{vipRunDiscountFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_school_count = #{maxSchoolCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
